SQL Injection.recommendations: Sanitize and validate all user inputs.

XSS.recommendations: Use Content Security Policy (CSP) and sanitize user inputs.

CSRF.description: Cross Site Request Forgery vulnerability found.
exploitation: Send unauthorized requests on behalf of the user
CSRF.recommendations: Implement anti-CSRF tokens in forms and validate them server-side.

exploitation: Execute arbitrary commands on the server
Command Injection.recommendations: Validate and sanitize user inputs and avoid using shell commands.

exploitation: Exploit the deserialization process to execute arbitrary code
Insecure Deserialization.recommendations: Use safe deserialization libraries and validate input data.

exploitation: Send crafted requests to access internal services
SSRF.recommendations: Validate and sanitize URLs and implement network segmentation.

exploitation: Inject malicious XML to access internal files
XXE.recommendations: Disable external entity parsing and validate XML inputs.

IDOR.description: Insecure Direct Object Reference vulnerability found.
exploitation: Access unauthorized resources by modifying URL parameters
IDOR.recommendations: Implement proper access controls and validate user inputs.
